name: North Salt-Flats
economy_niches: seasonal salt caravans and coastal transshipment
culture_adjustments: salt-matriarch/clan rituals outrank distant harbor clans locally
higher reliance on seasonal migrant labor over permanent burgs
laws emphasize shared pans and timed harvests over ship law
practical taboos around freshwater use and salt cross-contamination
constraints: scarce fresh water for settlement expansion

labor and harvests tied strictly to monsoon/tidal calendar
evaporation pans double as navigational and augury landmarks
